span.span: Controls access to shared property groups.

summary.span: 通过给定的信息查找或创建属性组。

span.span: Finds or creates a property group with the given information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `dwIsoMode` 在 get 和 set 操作期间，你可以通过指定 ，或通过指定在方法调用期间锁定属性，来选择使锁定属性成为原子的 。Using `dwIsoMode`, during get and set operations, you can either choose to make locking properties atomic by specifying , or to lock properties over the duration of the method call by specifying . > [!CAUTION] > 不要使用在 构造函数中创建属性组时，这样做可能会导致死锁。Do not use when creating a property group in a constructor, doing so can result in a deadlock. 如果为指定的发布模式 `dwRelMode` 为 ，则由指定的属性在 `name` 进程的生存期内保持活动状态。If the release mode specified for `dwRelMode` is , the property specified by `name` is held alive for the lifetime of the process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `CreatePropertyGroup` 方法创建共享的属性组管理器。The following code example shows how to use the `CreatePropertyGroup` method to create a shared property group manager. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties/CPP/receiptcounterclass.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties/CS/receiptcounterclass.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties/VB/receiptcounterclass.vb#2)]
